nodes.text: The Dlarit family was a Human family from the planet Thyferra. The Dlarit family were prominent members of the Xucphra Corporation, one of the two conglomerates which, along with their rival Zaltin Corporation, produced ninety-five percent of the bacta in the galaxy.

A notable member of this family was Erisi Dlarit, a former member of the Rogue Squadron. Erisi and her father, Aerin Dlarit, supported Ysanne Isard in her takeover of Thyferra and joined the Thyferran Home Defense Corps. Another member was Erisi's uncle, Aerin's brother, who discovered a contamination the Ashern rebels introduced into Lot ZX1449F.
